title: Bob The Temp in Casual Thursday
content:
I recently found a mod of Keen 4 I was working on a few years back entitled Bob the Temp in "Casual Thursday!," and I've decided to continue with it. However, I suck at pixel art.

To give it a certain "feel," I was thinking of having different people do different graphics. I guess I could do the rest, but I was wondering if anyone would be willing to draw a black, late-80s Smokey And The Bandit-era Pontiac Trans Am (you know, like what Apu has in The Simpsons) in Keens 4-6 style to replace the Bean-with-Bacon Megarocket.

It's kind of odd, but would anyone be willing to do that?-----------------------------------
[url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=izxrocVNVOk]Dnde Esta Jeff? [/url]
Take a look at these hands! The hands speaks. The hand of a government man.

title: Re: Anyone willing to do some artwork?
content:
I'd be happy to try it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rollhead.gif[/img]

By the title, it sounds like a fun game! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] [img]http://i91.photobucket.com/albums/k284/KeegTech/WarholDopefishPNG2.png[/img]

title: Re: Anyone willing to do some artwork?
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]By the title, it sounds like a fun game![hr][/quote]
I sure hope it will be. It's going to be set in a coastal town in the Pacific Northwest, so even if it isn't fun, it should have the nicest atmosphere in a Keen game [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] .

That'd be great if you could try it, KeegTech. Maybe I'll even have you do some more artwork [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] . But anyways, do you want a picture for reference?-----------------------------------
[url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=izxrocVNVOk]Dnde Esta Jeff? [/url]
Take a look at these hands! The hands speaks. The hand of a government man.

title: Re: Anyone willing to do some artwork?
content:
I'd be willing to chip in anywhere I might be useful.[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Awww! Feel the love!

content:

title: Re:
content:
Crap, I forgot about this. Well, it's back on track now, I have the story done, I just need to fix some issues with the graphics within the 4TXT files and it'll be 5% done.

Edit: Fixed for the most part now. I'll go ahead and upload the (now 6% done - I added a title screen that looks like crap) program in a second here.
